name: Save Our... Socks
description:
For never was a story of more woe than this of washing machine and a pair of socks.

There is no love stronger than love between a pair of socks. There is no opposition more brutal than the opposition between socks and washing machines.

Loving pair of socks was living peacefully in the house, but suddenly their world was ruined by human hand capturing them into the basement to be washed by the washing machine! 

All's fair in a war between angry machine and loving socks. 

Controls Player A

"WASD" keys for movements

"Space" to throw picked item

Player B

"Arrow" keys for movements

"Right CTRL" to throw picked item

Team

Sergey Andreev

Nikita Uginchus

Alexandra Petrova

Igor Kondratiev
